channel.title: Rune-Destiny Is Hiring!
channel.description:
Are you interested in joining the Rune-Destiny team? Do you think you have what it takes to be a web developer or Server Advertiser ? If you answered yes to these questions, we have good news: we're hiring!
There are some requirements that must be followed to join the
Web Development team: Know how SEO works can maintain and develop the IPB FOrums Showing Maturity Basic HTMl and PHP Knows GFX
Server Advertiser Fluent in english Marketing Strategy format knows gfx and video editing Large amount of friends/mates/players Influencial Know where to advertise
If you meet these requirements, the team is looking to hire you!
Add "kenneth.rsps" on Skype if you are interested with this position. First come first serve, so apply fast (no application - questions are based in an interview by owner of Rune-Destiny)!

item.title: Rune-Destiny Is Hiring!
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Hiring as in you will pay people? If so we don’t allow that on this website.

Read full topic
